introText: Bamboo Hair Salon is a boutique salon that has been in business for over 8 years. We have 5 stylists that offer a wide variety of cuts, colours and styles as well as our own in-house barber. We are known for our trendy colours and beautiful bridal hair! Our staff has gone through extensive training and has mastered virtually every style. Whether you want a vintage, classic, or modern look, we are the salon for you!
